INSERT INTO T_BOARD_FILE (BBS_SEQ, FILE_SEQ, FILE_ORG_NAME, FILE_NAME, FILE_EXT, FILE_SIZE, REG_DATE) VALUES (#{bbsSeq}, #{fileSeq}, #{fileOrgName}, #{fileName}, #{fileExt}, #{fileSize}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select:
SELECT RNUM, BBS_SEQ, USER_UID, USER_NICK, BBS_NO, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_LIKE_CNT, BBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, BBS_SEQ, USER_UID, USER_NICK, BBS_NO, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_LIKE_CNT, BBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE FROM(SELECT BBS_SEQ, NVL(B.USER_UID, '') AS USER_UID, NVL(B.USER_NICK, '') AS USER_NICK, NVL(A.BBS_NO, 0) AS BBS_NO, NVL(BBS_TITLE, '') AS BBS_TITLE, NVL(BBS_CONTENT, '') AS BBS_CONTENT, A.BBS_LIKE_CNT AS BBS_LIKE_CNT, NVL(BBS_READ_CNT, 0) AS BBS_READ_CNT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '') AS REG_DATE FROM T_BOARD A, T_USER B WHERE A.USER_UID = B.USER_UID AND A.BBS_NO = #{bbsNo} AND A.BBS_TITLE IS NOT NULL
AND B.USER_NICK LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND A.BBS_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.BBS_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0
ORDER BY A.BBS_LIKE_CNT DESC
ORDER BY A.BBS_READ_CNT DESC
ORDER BY A.BBS_SEQ DESC
))
WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow} ORDER BY RNUM ASC

SELECT COUNT(A.BBS_SEQ) AS CNT FROM T_BOARD A, T_USER B WHERE A.USER_UID = B.USER_UID AND A.BBS_TITLE IS NOT NULL
AND B.USER_NICK LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND A.BBS_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.BBS_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0

SELECT A.BBS_SEQ, NVL(B.USER_UID, '') AS USER_UID, NVL(B.USER_NICK, '') AS USER_NICK, NVL(A.BBS_NO, 0) AS BBS_NO, NVL(BBS_TITLE, '') AS BBS_TITLE, NVL(BBS_CONTENT, '') AS BBS_CONTENT, NVL(A.BBS_LIKE_CNT, 0) AS BBS_LIKE_CNT, NVL(BBS_READ_CNT, 0) AS BBS_READ_CNT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(A.BBS_COMMENT, '') AS BBS_COMMENT, NVL(COMMENT_PARENT, 0) AS COMMENT_PARENT, NVL(COMMENT_GROUP, 0) AS COMMENT_GROUP, NVL(COMMENT_ORDER, 0) AS COMMENT_ORDER, NVL(COMMENT_INDENT, 0) AS COMMENT_INDENT FROM T_BOARD A, T_USER B WHERE A.BBS_SEQ = #{value} AND A.USER_UID = B.USER_UID

SELECT BBS_SEQ, FILE_SEQ, NVL(FILE_ORG_NAME, '') AS FILE_ORG_NAME, NVL(FILE_NAME, '') AS FILE_NAME, NVL(FILE_EXT, '') AS FILE_EXT, NVL(FILE_SIZE, 0) AS FILE_SIZE, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE FROM T_BOARD_FILE WHERE BBS_SEQ = #{value} AND FILE_SEQ = 1

SELECT RNUM, BBS_SEQ, USER_UID, USER_NICK, BBS_NO, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_LIKE_CNT, BBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE, FILE_NAME FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, BBS_SEQ, USER_UID, USER_NICK, BBS_NO, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_LIKE_CNT, BBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE, FILE_NAME FROM(SELECT A.BBS_SEQ, NVL(B.USER_UID, '') AS USER_UID, NVL(B.USER_NICK, '') AS USER_NICK, NVL(A.BBS_NO, 0) AS BBS_NO, NVL(BBS_TITLE, '') AS BBS_TITLE, NVL(BBS_CONTENT, '') AS BBS_CONTENT, A.BBS_LIKE_CNT AS BBS_LIKE_CNT, NVL(BBS_READ_CNT, 0) AS BBS_READ_CNT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '') AS REG_DATE, C.FILE_NAME AS FILE_NAME FROM T_BOARD A, T_USER B, T_BOARD_FILE C WHERE A.USER_UID = B.USER_UID AND A.BBS_SEQ = C.BBS_SEQ AND A.BBS_NO = #{bbsNo} AND A.BBS_TITLE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY A.BBS_LIKE_CNT DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow} ORDER BY RNUM ASC

SELECT RNUM, BBS_SEQ, USER_UID, USER_NICK, BBS_NO, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_LIKE_CNT, BBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, BBS_SEQ, USER_UID, USER_NICK, BBS_NO, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_LIKE_CNT, BBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE FROM(SELECT C.BBS_SEQ, NVL(C.USER_UID, '') AS USER_UID, NVL(B.USER_NICK, '') AS USER_NICK, NVL(A.BBS_NO, 0) AS BBS_NO, NVL(BBS_TITLE, '') AS BBS_TITLE, NVL(BBS_CONTENT, '') AS BBS_CONTENT, A.BBS_LIKE_CNT AS BBS_LIKE_CNT, NVL(BBS_READ_CNT, 0) AS BBS_READ_CNT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '') AS REG_DATE FROM T_BOARD A, T_USER B, T_BOARD_MARK C WHERE C.USER_UID = B.USER_UID AND A.BBS_NO = #{bbsNo} AND C.BBS_SEQ = A.BBS_SEQ AND A.BBS_TITLE IS NOT NULL AND C.USER_UID= #{userUID}
AND B.USER_NICK LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND A.BBS_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.BBS_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0
ORDER BY A.BBS_LIKE_CNT DESC
ORDER BY A.BBS_READ_CNT DESC
ORDER BY C.BBS_SEQ DESC
))
WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow} ORDER BY RNUM ASC
